awscc_ses_mail_manager_rule_set (Data Source)

Data Source schema for AWS::SES::MailManagerRuleSet

Schema

Required

  • id (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.

Read-Only

  • rule_set_arn (String)
  • rule_set_id (String)
  • rule_set_name (String)
  • rules (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)
  • tags (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for rules

Read-Only:

  • actions (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)
  • conditions (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)
  • name (String)
  • unless (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for rules.actions

Read-Only:

  • add_header (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • archive (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • deliver_to_mailbox (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • deliver_to_q_business (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • drop (String)
  • relay (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • replace_recipient (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • send (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • write_to_s3 (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for rules.actions.add_header

Read-Only:

  • header_name (String)
  • header_value (String)

Nested Schema for rules.actions.archive

Read-Only:

  • action_failure_policy (String)
  • target_archive (String)

Nested Schema for rules.actions.deliver_to_mailbox

Read-Only:

  • action_failure_policy (String)
  • mailbox_arn (String)
  • role_arn (String)

Nested Schema for rules.actions.deliver_to_q_business

Read-Only:

  • action_failure_policy (String)
  • application_id (String)
  • index_id (String)
  • role_arn (String)

Nested Schema for rules.actions.relay

Read-Only:

  • action_failure_policy (String)
  • mail_from (String)
  • relay (String)

Nested Schema for rules.actions.replace_recipient

Read-Only:

  • replace_with (List of String)

Nested Schema for rules.actions.send

Read-Only:

  • action_failure_policy (String)
  • role_arn (String)

Nested Schema for rules.actions.write_to_s3

Read-Only:

  • action_failure_policy (String)
  • role_arn (String)
  • s3_bucket (String)
  • s3_prefix (String)
  • s3_sse_kms_key_id (String)

Nested Schema for rules.conditions

Read-Only:

  • boolean_expression (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • dmarc_expression (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • ip_expression (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • number_expression (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • string_expression (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • verdict_expression (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for rules.conditions.boolean_expression

Read-Only:

  • evaluate (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • operator (String)

Nested Schema for rules.conditions.boolean_expression.evaluate

Read-Only:

  • attribute (String)

Nested Schema for rules.conditions.dmarc_expression

Read-Only:

  • operator (String)
  • values (List of String)

Nested Schema for rules.conditions.ip_expression

  • evaluate (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • operator (String)
  • values (List of String)

Read-Only:

  • attribute (String)

Nested Schema for rules.conditions.number_expression

Read-Only:

  • value (Number)
